CONSUMABLE_HINT_UNAVAILABLE CONSUMABLE_HINT_UNAVAILABLE
$1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_ALREADY_AT_MAX CONSUMABLE_ALREADY_AT_MAX $1$2$4 $1$2$4 $1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_MAXED_SKILL CONSUMABLE_MAXED_SKILL $1$2$4 $1$2$4 $1$2$4
$1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_HINT_HERO_SELECTOR CONSUMABLE_HINT_HERO_SELECTOR
CONSUMABLE_FUEL_STOCK Fuel Stock $1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_FUEL_STOCK_LORE Everyone predicted that cold fusion would change the world, but four centuries and several catastrophes later, here we stand with a fuel pistol in our hand.
CONSUMABLE_DATA_FRAGMENT Data Fragment CONSUMABLE_DATA_FRAGMENT_DESCRIPTION CONSUMABLE_DATA_FRAGMENT_DESCRIPTION CONSUMABLE_DATA_FRAGMENT_LORE These Primals-made relics are littered all over the place. Theta wave theory, RC marker theory, and even the Sinestetic (widely known as "Rum smells like Christmas" theory) have been postulated. The truth is, we still know nothing about the mechanism that unlocks the unconscious parts of the brain.
CONSUMABLE_MAGNESIUM_TORCH Magnesium Torch CONSUMABLE_MAGNESIUM_TORCH_DESCRIPTION Clears the Fog of War around the commander
CONSUMABLE_MAGNESIUM_TORCH_LORE There's almost no magnesium in these torches but "liquid metal nano injections that burn in the oscillatory vacuum when approaching zero G" doesn't fit on the label.
CONSUMABLE_MEMORY_WIPER Memory Wiper
CONSUMABLE_MEMORY_WIPER_DESCRIPTION Nearest building will "forget" that this commander has already visited it. (Does not work on buildings disabled after a battle) CONSUMABLE_MEMORY_WIPER_LORE One of the many alien technologies provided to UNSS by its Hesperidian allies. Once the prototypes reached the hands of security agencies, the UNSS "democracy" became much more stable.
CONSUMABLE_ANCIENT_DATASCROLL_SKILL_LEARNING_DESCRIPTION The commander will learn or level up the {1} skill. CONSUMABLE_COMBAT_MANUAL_ABILITY_LEARNING_DESCRIPTION The commander will learn the {1} ability. CONSUMABLE_ANCIENT_DATASCROLL_LORE Do it too often, and your brain crawls out through your ears. Strangely, this warning also applies to inorganic life forms and their cognitive centers. The ancient Primals clearly had no trouble deploying what some might consider "invasive" data transfers. CONSUMABLE_COMBAT_MANUAL_LORE This Primals toy can hold the whole library but sadly your weak mind can take no more. You already feel like someone rubbed your skull with a wire brush. From inside. It's a waste. Even more, so because it is single-use.

CONSUMABLE_RECHARGE_CELL Recharge Cell $1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_RECHARGE_CELL_LORE Though all the Children of the Source possess recharging devices disintegrating organic matter for the energy the good old Recharge cells are always their first choice. Also, now you know why they understand what is the toilet despite being robots. You are welcome.
CONSUMABLE_PLANETFALL_BEACON_RESOURCES Planet Fall Beacon - Resources $1$2$4 $1$2$4
CONSUMABLE_EXTRA_RATIONS Extra Rations $1$2$4 CONSUMABLE_EXTRA_RATIONS_LORE Recharge stuff for robots, some cryo-fixated food for the organics, combat stimulants, and for some reason an old issue of Mole Babes magazine for "people" who are into such things. $1$2$4
